resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit this game?
Do you really want to exit?
Your task is very simple, just look for two similar shapes and the line between the two shapes is no more than twice, click to remove them. See the illustration below:
Each time you remove two pictures you will score, the game is completed when you remove all the images before the timer runs out.
Pikachu is a very popular game, especially for the office world.
Marking the appearance of the game pikachu made the storm in Vietnam.
With pikachu game, the game will bring memorable memories for you.
Those must be strange and interesting moments with pikachu game that "tortured" your eyes.
Let"s review the memory of this pikachu game!
